name: 李穎玟
objective: The course is designed for the students with engineering background.The contents of this course include electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.
schedule:
week1   Introduction 
week2   Electric charge, force, and field
week3   Electric field and Gauss’ law
week4   Gauss' law and Electric potential 
week5   Electric potential 
week6   Electric circuit (A)
week7   Electric circuit (B)
week8   Electric circuit (C) 
week9   Midterm
week10 Magnetic force and field (A)
week11 Magnetic force and field (B)
week12 Reflection and refraction         
week13 Images and optical instrument (A)	        
week14 Images and optical instrument (B)
week15 Interference
week16 Diffraction
week17 Final
scorePolicy:
Homework (20%)  
Midterm (25%)  
Final (35%)
Others (20%) - Attendance and class performance
materials:
Textbook:
Essential University Physics/ Wolfson, Richard/ 4th Edition
